title: Vision. [No. 28]
creator_credit: United States Information Agency, Ted Steeg Productions and Ted Steeg
brief_description: Cinemagazine: Colleges in America teach puppetry; US Patent Office grants exclusive rights to and protects all new inventions; an aerial circus; an exploration of how solar energy houses work and some examples; Girls’ Basketball Tournament in Iowa is complete with bands, beauty queens and drill teams; Thoreau’s Walden Pond philosophy he created when he lived in the wilderness.
creator_credit_for_label: United States Information Agency, Ted Steeg Productions and Ted Steeg
